description.p: KapitonovPluginsPack contains the following LADSPA/LV2 plugins to customize your guitar tones:

ul.li: tubeAmp: Advanced guitar tube amp emulator. Contains preamp, tonestack, power amp with voltage sag, cabinet emulators. Emulation parameters of each component are set by profile files. LV2 only.
Bluedream: Booster/Tube Screamer pedal with equalizer (tonestack). LV2 version has GUI.
Distruction: Distortion pedal with equalizer (tonestack). LV2 version has GUI.
Fuzz: Vintage fuzz pedal. LV2 version has GUI.
Deadgate: Effective Noise Gate/Dead Zone effect plugin.
Single2Humbucker: Plugin for emulation humbucker pickup sound with single coil pickup on the guitar. Useful for playing heavy-metal on Stratocaster guitar with single coil pickups.

release.description: Fix a crash in the file picker dialog.

description.p: This release tested with Ardour 6.0 and brings back broken since 1.1 GUI with Qtractor!

ul.li: Added a built-in file picker dialog which replaces zenity.
Changed the models of Fuzz and Distortion plugins, now they emulate.
Fixed bug with GUI plugins in Qtractor.
